questiontext.text:
Optional

At various points in the semester the rankings of the forecasts for this assignment will be featured in the lectures.

If you would like to appear on the forecasting accuracy leaderboard under an alias, you can enter it here: {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%alias name#}.

Produce a forecast of the Google (GOOG) closing stock price on 24 March 2025 in $USD (https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/GOOG/ or https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/stocks/goog/historical).

The forecast mean: {1:NUMERICAL:=140.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable point forecast}

The 80% forecast interval: [lower={1:NUMERICAL:=140.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable lower 80% bound}, upper={1:NUMERICAL:=140.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable upper 80% bound}]80%.
Explanation of how you obtained your forecasts, no more than a couple of sentences.

Produce a forecast of the maximum temperature at Melbourne airport in degrees Celsius on 14 April 2025 (http://www.bom.gov.au/climate/dwo/IDCJDW3049.latest.shtml/)

The forecast mean: {1:NUMERICAL:=20.000000:20.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable point forecast}

The 80% forecast interval: [lower={1:NUMERICAL:=20.000000:20.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable lower 80% bound}, upper={1:NUMERICAL:=20.000000:20.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable upper 80% bound}]80%.
Explanation of how you obtained your forecasts, no more than a couple of sentences.

Produce a forecast for the difference in points (Collingwood minus Essendon) scored in the AFL match between Collingwood and Essendon for the Anzac Day clash. 25 April 2025 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anzac_Day_match).

The forecast mean: {1:NUMERICAL:=0.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable point forecast}

The 80% forecast interval: [lower={1:NUMERICAL:=0.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable lower 80% bound}, upper={1:NUMERICAL:=0.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable upper 80% bound}]80%.
Explanation of how you obtained your forecasts, no more than a couple of sentences.

Produce a forecast for the seasonally adjusted estimate of total employment (in persons) for April 2025. ABS CAT 6202, to be released around mid May 2025 (https://www.abs.gov.au/statistics/labour/employment-and-unemployment/labour-force-australia/latest-release)

The forecast mean: {1:NUMERICAL:=14000000.000000:2000000.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable point forecast}

The 80% forecast interval: [lower={1:NUMERICAL:=14000000.000000:2000000.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable lower 80% bound}, upper={1:NUMERICAL:=14000000.000000:2000000.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable upper 80% bound}]80%.
Explanation of how you obtained your forecasts, no more than a couple of sentences.

Produce a forecast of the Google (GOOG) closing stock price on 26 May 2025 in $USD (https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/GOOG/ or https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/stocks/goog/historical).

The forecast mean: {1:NUMERICAL:=140.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable point forecast}

The 80% forecast interval: [lower={1:NUMERICAL:=140.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable lower 80% bound}, upper={1:NUMERICAL:=140.000000:100.000000#Yes, that is a reasonable upper 80% bound}]80%.
Explanation of how you obtained your forecasts, no more than a couple of sentences.
